pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā udāyī araññe viharati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.3: Tassāyasmato vihāro abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko, majjhegabbho, samantāpariyāgāro,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.7: Bahū manussā āyasmato udāyissa vihārapekkhakā āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.8: Aññataropi brāhmaṇo sapajāpatiko yenāyasmā udāyī tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.11: avāpuraṇaṃ ādāya ghaṭikaṃ ugghāṭetvā kavāṭaṃ paṇāmetvā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.12: Sopi kho brāhmaṇo āyasmato udāyissa piṭṭhito pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.13: Sāpi kho brāhmaṇī tassa brāhmaṇassa piṭṭhito pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.14: Atha kho āyasmā udāyī ekacce vātapāne vivaranto ekacce vātapāne thakento gabbhaṃ anuparigantvā piṭṭhito āgantvā tassā brāhmaṇiyā aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.15: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo āyasmatā udāyinā saddhiṃ paṭisammoditvā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.16: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo attamano attamanavācaṃ nicchāresi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.17: “uḷārā ime samaṇā sakyaputtiyā ye ime evarūpe araññe viharanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.18: Bhavampi udāyī uḷāro yo evarūpe araññe viharatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.19: Evaṃ vutte, sā brāhmaṇī taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.21: Yatheva me tvaṃ aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasi evameva me samaṇo udāyī aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.22: Atha kho so brāhmaṇo ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.24: Ime hi nāma dhammacārino samacārino brahmacārino saccavādino sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā paṭijānissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.25: Natthi imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ natthi imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ naṭṭhaṃ imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.26: kuto imesaṃ sāmaññaṃ kuto imesaṃ brahmaññaṃ, apagatā ime sāmaññā apagatā ime brahmaññā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.27: Kathañhi nāma samaṇo udāyī mama bhariyāya aṅgamaṅgāni parāmasissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.28: Na hi sakkā kulitthīhi kuladhītāhi kulakumārīhi kulasuṇhāhi kuladāsīhi ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā gantuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.1.29: Sace kulitthiyo kuladhītaro kulakumāriyo kulasuṇhāyo kuladāsiyo ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā gaccheyyuṃ, tāpi samaṇā sakyaputtiyā dūseyyun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhu tassa brāhmaṇassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.3: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.4: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.5: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṃghaṃ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.6: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, udāyi, mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjasī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.9: “ananucchavikaṃ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.10: Kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.11: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:1.2.15: “Yo pana bhikkhu otiṇṇo vipariṇatena cittena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjeyya hatthaggāhaṃ vā veṇiggāhaṃ vā aññatarassa vā aññatarassa vā aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ, saṃghādiseso”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:2.1.11: Api ca rattaṃ cittaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetaṃ vipariṇatanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:2.1.13: manussitthī, na yakkhī na petī, na tiracchānagatā. Antamaso tadahujātāpi dārikā, pageva mahattarī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:2.1.21: suddhakesā vā, suttamissā vā, mālāmissā vā, hiraññamissā vā, suvaṇṇamissā vā, muttāmissā vā, maṇimissā vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:2.1.23: hatthañca veṇiñca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ aṅgaṃ nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:2.2.1: Āmasanā, parāmasanā, omasanā, ummasanā, olaṅghanā, ullaṅghanā, ākaḍḍhanā, patikaḍḍhanā, abhiniggaṇhanā, abhinippīḷanā, gahaṇaṃ, chupanaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca bhikkhu ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.2: Naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati omasati ummasati olaṅgheti ullaṅgheti ākaḍḍhati patikaḍḍhati abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti gaṇhāti chupati, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.3: Itthī ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.4: Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.6: Itthī ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.7: Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.9: Itthī ca hoti purisasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.10: Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.12: Itthī ca hoti tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.13: Bhikkhu ca naṃ itthiyā kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.15: Paṇḍako ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.16: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.18: Paṇḍako ca hoti vematiko sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.19: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.21: Paṇḍako ca hoti purisasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.22: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.25: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.28: Bhikkhu ca naṃ paṇḍakassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.31: Bhikkhu ca naṃ purisassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.36: puriso ca hoti paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.37: Bhikkhu ca naṃ purisassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.40: Bhikkhu ca naṃ tiracchānagatassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.1.47: Bhikkhu ca naṃ tiracchānagatassa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.1: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.2: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.4: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ vematiko sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.5: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.10: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.12: Dve paṇḍakā dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ paṇḍakasaññī sāratto ca bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.18: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ paṇḍakānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.20: Dve purisā dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ purisasaññī sāratto ca bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.26: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.28: Dve tiracchānagatā dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ tiracchānagatasaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.29: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.2.35: Bhikkhu ca naṃ dvinnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati …pe…

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.5.1: Itthī ca hoti itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.5.2: Itthī ca naṃ bhikkhussa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasati parāmasati omasati ummasati olaṅgheti ullaṅgheti ākaḍḍhati patikaḍḍhati abhiniggaṇhāti abhinippīḷeti gaṇhāti chupati, sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa …pe….
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.5.3: Dve itthiyo dvinnaṃ itthīnaṃ itthisaññī sāratto ca.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.5.4: Itthiyo ca naṃ bhikkhussa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasanti parāmasanti omasanti ummasanti olaṅghenti ullaṅghenti ākaḍḍhanti patikaḍḍhanti abhiniggaṇhanti abhinippīḷenti gaṇhanti chupanti, sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti dvinnaṃ saṃghādisesānaṃ …pe….

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.5.6: Ubho ca naṃ bhikkhussa kāyena kāyaṃ āmasanti parāmasanti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.5.7: gaṇhanti chupanti, sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti saṃghādisesena dukkaṭassa …pe….

pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.1: Sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti saṃghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.2: Sevanādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.3: Sevanādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.4: Sevanādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.5: Mokkhādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati, phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.6: Mokkhādhippāyo kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.7: Mokkhādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:3.6.8: Mokkhādhippāyo na ca kāyena vāyamati, na ca phassaṃ paṭivijānāti, anāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.1.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu mātuyā mātupemena āmasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.1.4: kacci nu kho ahaṃ saṃghādisesaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.1.8: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu dhītuyā dhītupemena āmasi …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.2.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu purāṇadutiyikāya kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.3.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu yakkhiniyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.3.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu paṇḍakassa kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.4.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu suttitthiyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.4.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu matitthiyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.4.8: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu tiracchānagatitthiyā kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.4.12: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu dārudhītalikāya kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.5.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā itthiyo aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ sampīḷetvā bāhāparamparāya ānesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.6.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiyā abhirūḷhaṃ saṅkamaṃ sāratto sañcālesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.7.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiṃ paṭipathe passitvā sāratto aṃsakūṭena pahāraṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.8.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiyā abhirūḷhaṃ rukkhaṃ sāratto sañcālesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.8.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiyā abhirūḷhaṃ nāvaṃ sāratto sañcālesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.9.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiyā gahitaṃ rajjuṃ sāratto āviñchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.9.5: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiyā gahitaṃ daṇḍaṃ sāratto āviñchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.10.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu sāratto itthiṃ pattena paṇāmesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.11.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiyā vandantiyā sāratto pādaṃ uccāresi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss2:4.11.4: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu itthiṃ gahessāmīti vāyamitvā na chupi.
